headlines.description: — Jack Suwinski doesn't step into the batter's box trying to hit home runs. The Pittsburgh Pirates outfielder is hitting them anyway.
headlines.shortLinkText: Suwinski, VanMeter hit 3-run HRs, Pirates beat Rockies 10-5

video.headline: Josh VanMeter's 3-run HR extends the Pirates' lead

headlines.description: — The basics of hitting and scoring have been a persistent difficulty for Detroit this season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Candelario's homer in 10th lifts Tigers in 4-2 win vs. Twins

video.headline: Candelario cranks a 2-run homer in extras

events.name: New York Mets at San Francisco Giants

headlines.description: — Evan Longoria homered twice and Joc Pederson hit his fourth in two games as the San Francisco Giants went deep four times in the first two innings off rookie Thomas Szapucki and routed the New York Mets 9-3 Wednesday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Longoria, Giants tee off on Mets rookie Szapucki in 9-3 rout

video.headline: Longoria hits his first 2 homers of the season

tracking.trackingName: COM_MLB Highlight (Longoria hits his first 2 homers of the season) 2022/5/25 ESHEET

events.name: Los Angeles Dodgers at Washington Nationals

headlines.description: — Erick Fedde and three relievers combined on a six-hitter, César Hernández had an RBI single and the Washington Nationals beat the Los Angeles Dodgers 1-0 Wednesday to avoid a series sweep.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nationals end skid against Dodgers, win 1-0 in series finale

video.headline: Cesar Hernandez singles to snag lead for Nationals

tracking.trackingName: MLB_One-Play (Cesar Hernandez singles to snag lead for Nationals) 2022/05/25 ESHEET

events.name: Milwaukee Brewers at San Diego Padres

headlines.description: — Kolten Wong may have saved the game with his flashy glovework. Luis Urías may have saved it with a deft slide into third base past Manny Machado's tag.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tellez, Brewers beat Darvish, Padres 2-1 to take 2 of 3

video.headline: Check out Kolten Wong's ridiculous glove work to get the out

headlines.description: — Less than two months into the season, the Seattle Mariners are quickly trending toward irrelevance in a season that started with expectations of ending the longest playoff drought in the major leagues.
headlines.shortLinkText: Oakland continues Seattle's slide with 4-2 win over Mariners
